CustomField.formula:
( Case ( Unique_Article__c , "Yes +15", 15, 0)+ Case ( Title_format__c ,"Yes +15", 15, "No",0,10) + Case ( Contains_Accurate_Information__c , "Yes +20", 20, "No", 0, 15) + Case ( Question_Problem_Context__c ,"Yes +15", 15, "No", 0, 10) + Case ( Answer_Solution__c ,"Yes +15", 15, "No", 0, 10) +
IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "AC Type +4"), 4, 0) + IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "Supported Products +4"), 4, 0) + IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "Part Number +3"), 3, 0) + IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "SW Version +3"), 3, 0) + IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "Phase of Flight +2"), 2, 0)+ IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "FDE / Event +2"), 2, 0)+ IF(INCLUDES( Environment_Fields__c, "Fault Messages +2"), 2, 0) )
CustomField.label: Article Quality
